scenario.name: UAC outgoing unau
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] To: [field1] <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> User-Agent: SIPp Client Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,UPDATE,REFER,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,INFO Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]

ACK sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] To: [field1] <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] User-Agent: SIPp Client Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] To: [field1] <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] User-Agent: SIPp Client Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0
